member.summary: Execute turntable moves

member.summary: Fires all lasers and adds the damage to robots

member.summary: Determines if a given coordinate contains a pit

member.summary: Finds a wall if it exists between two coordinates, inclusive.
member.param: The coordinate to start searching from
The coordinate to stop searching at
The direction along which to search
member.returns: The furthest coordinate along the direction something can move before hitting the wall, or null if no wall was found

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.boardEffects.moveConveyors(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Moves all robots on conveyors
member.param: True indicates only express conveyors should move

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.boardEffects.canMoveOnConveyor(RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Robot,RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Robot[],System.Collections.Generic.List{RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.ConveyorModel}@)
member.summary: Helper method for conveyor movement. Checks to see if a robot on a conveyor is able to move
member.param: The robot that is moving
An array of all robots that are on conveyors
A reference to a list of robots on conveyors that are able to move
member.returns: True if the robot can move

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.boardEffects.fireBotLasers(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.SByte}@)
member.summary: Fires robot lasers and adds the damage to a dictionary
member.returns: True if a bot was hit

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.boardEffects.fireBoardLasers(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.SByte}@)
member.summary: Fires the board lasers and adds the damage to a dictionary
member.returns: True if a bot was hit

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.boardEffects.LoS(System.Int32[],RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Robot.orientation,System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds if a there is a bot in line of sight between two coordinates inclusive. The toCord should be in the direction of the facing.
member.param: { X, Y } The coordinate to start looking for a LoS on a bot
The direction to search along
{ X, Y } Optionally, a coordinate to stop looking (defaults to edge of board)
If a bot is looking for another bot, ensures it doesn't find itself
member.returns: The bot number, or -1 for no result

member.name: T:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveCalculator
member.summary: Controls all bot movement Wrapping public methods in lock statements is probably overkill, but doesn't hurt.

member.name: T:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveCalculator.movement
member.summary: Enumeration for movement commands for robot

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveCalculator.executeRegisters
member.summary: Executes and resolves the round registers, including board effects

member.summary: Processes a bot move order
member.param: The order to process
member.returns: True if the bot successfully received and completed the move

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveCalculator.calculateMove(RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveModel)
member.summary: Calculates and resolves all necessary moves for a robot and any other robots affected by the move.
member.param: The movmeModel to resolve
member.returns: A list of orders for robots

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveCalculator.resolveMove(RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Robot,RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Robot.orientation,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.orderModel}@,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a movement program that resolves one bot's movement and its impact on any other bots on the board. Executes recursively.
member.param: The bot being moved
The direction the bot is moving.
The number of spaces being moved
A reference to the list of move orders to modify
Indicates if the bot should move laterally if able
True if the movement is caused by a conveyor belt
member.returns: The total number of spaces the bot will actually be moving (i.e. is able to move)

member.name: M:RoboRuckus.RuckusCode.Movement.moveCalculator.executePlayerMoves(System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes all the player moves in the current register
member.param: The current register being executed

member.summary: Checks for obstacles on the board that block bot movement
member.param: [x,y] The coordinate the bot will be moving from
[x,y] The coordinate the bot will be moving to
member.returns: True if there's a non-bot obstacle between those two spaces
